sentences.en: ‘Datum’ is the singular of ‘data’. datum
sentences.cn: 是 data 的单数形式。

sentences.en: " Boy " is singular, and " boys " is plural.
sentences.cn: boy是单数, boys 是复数.

sentences.en: " One box " is singular; " two boxes " is plural.
sentences.cn: “ Onebox ” 是单数, “ twoboxes ” 是复数.

sentences.en: a singular achievement
sentences.cn: 非凡的成就

sentences.en: A singular glow came from the unidentified flying object.
sentences.cn: 从不明飞行物上发出奇特的光.

sentences.en: Barre was quickly drawn into the electoral arena, although with singular lack of success.
sentences.cn: 尽管胜算微乎其微，巴雷还是很快被身不由己地推到了选举的舞台上。

sentences.en: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentences.cn: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentences.en: He showed a singular lack of tact in the way he handled the situation.
sentences.cn: 他处理这局面的方式显得极不得体。

sentences.en: I had a singular adventure.
sentences.cn: 我曾经历过一次奇特的冒险.

sentences.en: I was struck with the man's singular appearance.
sentences.cn: 那个人的奇特外貌给我留下了深刻的印象.

sentences.en: I wondered why she was behaving in so singular a fashion.
sentences.cn: 我真奇怪她为什么会有如此异常的行为。

sentences.en: If the subject is singular, use a singular verb.
sentences.cn: 如果主语是单数，就用单数动词。

sentences.en: The noun " mouse " is the singular form of " mice " .
sentences.cn: 名词mouse是 mice 的单数形式.

sentences.en: The noun is in the singular.
sentences.cn: 这个名词是单数形式.

sentences.en: The old man who lived alone had singular table manners.
sentences.cn: 那个独身生活的老人有一种奇怪的就餐规矩.

sentences.en: the singular form of the noun
sentences.cn: 该名词的单数形式

sentences.en: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
sentences.cn: Inuit（依努依特人）的单数形式是Inuk。

sentences.en: The word "you" can be singular or plural.
sentences.cn: 单词you可以是单数也可以是复数。

sentences.en: The young man has a singular ear for music.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人对音乐有非凡的欣赏力.

sentences.en: This fiasco confirmed Kennedy's impression of Phoumi's singular incompetence.
sentences.cn: 这次惨败更加坚定了肯尼迪认为富米毫无能力的看法.

sentences.en: Where he got that singular notion I just can't think.
sentences.cn: 我真想不出来他从哪来的那种奇怪念头。

words.tran_cn: 异常地；非常地；令人无法理解地
使显著；使单一化；使成为唯一；使成为单数
不寻常的,无比的,空前的,突出的,稀有的
不常见的,稀奇的,古怪的,异常的

trans.tran_cn: <语>单数的，<正>突出的，奇特的，非凡的
trans.tran_en: a singular noun, verb, form etc is used when writing or speaking about one person or thing
the form of a word used when writing or speaking about one person or thing
